content.raw:
The code coverage drop appears to be a bug in code coverage, so I think we can ignore that.

However, the Windows Jenkins Pipeline is currently failing with an [internal compiler error](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/sw_ignition/job/ignition_plugin-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/34/console), so that’s concerning. I’ll try to test this branch on a Windows machine.
